main event: An unidentified object was observed in the sky over Miami, Florida on December 15, 1955, described as a sharply outlined white light with a yellow tint.
interesting points: The object moved approximately 1 degree per minute before disappearing below the horizon., The sighting lasted about 30 minutes., The object was potentially identified as the planet Sirius by observers., A witness described seeing a bright light that appeared to drop faster than a star., The civil observers were able to confirm the presence of the light but did not take clear photographs.
sighted object: a sharply outlined white light with a tint of yellow
witness description: civilians, including employees of the Miami Daily News
